|| vegetative || Stage of growth when vegetative structures are being produced. No reproductive structures present. || PO:0007134 : A vegetative growth || http://www.plantontology.org/amigo/go.cgi?view=details&search_constraint=terms&depth=0&query=PO:0007134&session_id=8853b1313685810&show_associations=list ||
